Text:
Dear kingcom1

Many thanks for this GREAT upload, please keep this truly Amazing work

you are welcome :)

please, keep it up & SEED, everyone

First of all, thanks very much for great content.  I appreciate you sharing it.

Might I recommend that, in the future, you encode the audio files in something a little smaller than AIFF?  When I encoded these files as ultra high quality MP3, the size dropped down to just 400MB.

For folks trying to get it quickly, size does matter.  Just a thought.  Thanks again.
